html.div: *Re-enter the API key before clicking Save.
*Re-enter the Auth Token before clicking Save.
*Re-enter the Client Secret before clicking Save.

div.p: Update the following macro definitions based on the data source (index) in your environment.
Update the following macro definitions to summariesonly=true if you have enabled the accelerated data models for better search performance.
The following macros are being utilized in several dashboards and searches. Update these macros based on what’s required for your environmental needs.

tr.th: Home Location Latitude (For Network Traffic Map)
Home Location Longitude (For Network Traffic Map)

div.p: The following macros are used to whitelist (filter) the results from various alerts and search queries. These macros can be updated to filter the results in order to avoid any false positives.
